name: City of Ghosts - Chapter I
description:
A new Horror Zombie Shooter FPS Game for PC made by me [Abhijit Ranjan] on Unity.  Currently a demo version here.  Some glitches may be encountered during playing this game which can be resolved in its full version which is under development. However, I hope, you will enjoy this game. Best experience on 8 GB  or more RAM system. I am looking forward for your valuable comments (obviously good or bad) during playing this game for its betterment.

Please do write your comments after experiencing this game.  It will help me to know drawbacks of the game. You may also access to me through my email id: abhijitranjan15@gmail.com
